title: Sudodle
rulesGuesses: Guess the hidden grid! There should be one of each number in every row and column. Green tiles are correct, yellow tiles are incorrect.
rulesSingleTurn: Green tiles are correctly placed, yellow tiles are not. Find the correct arrangement knowing that each digit appears once in every row and column.
outOfGuesses: Oh no! You ran out of guesses!
shareWinTitle: I solved this Sudodle in {count} guesses!
dragTilesInstruction: Tap a tile to change its digit, or drag a tile on top of another to swap them
